website_summaries.verdict: Offers sound safety features for infants, though you may find it provides an extra snug fit for a larger baby.
pros: Has Britax's renowned safety features, including shock absorbing base and sturdy steel frame
Also sports advanced padded layers for added protection and a canopy for sun shade
cons: The seat is somewhat small, and the leg strap tends to be tight if baby is on the larger side

website_summaries.verdict: A well cushioned and ultra supportive infant car seat that doesn't cut any corners when it comes to safety. We also happen to love the adorable cow print.
pros: Plush infant insert can be removed to accommodate growth
Features an impact absorbing shell and a foam lined headrest for double the protection
Contoured to reduce side-to-side shifting and save space
cons: Some parents felt the extra depth made it more difficult to lift babies out of the seat

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY NARROW - WILL NOT FIT A  BABY MORE THAN 15 POUNDS
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge disappointment. We love our Britax stroller and for the other 2 kids we had Peg Pereggo Seat that reached it's age. I thought great, I'll get this for our third kid so that it natively fits in the stroller. However, the other 1 star reviews are right. This thing is NARROW. THERE IS NO WAY A 35POUND BABY can actually fit in here. Ours is about 16 pounds now and we are having to buy a new seat. For reference he fits fine in the Peg Pereggo. This is a huge disappointment and not in line with what Britax is capable of bringing to the market
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We had the older version of this seat and always felt like it needed some more cushion to it. Britax def stepped it up with this one. It may be a little snugger for a chunky babe, but I don't feel like it's too slim. Any car seat is going to be heavy and hot, so I fully expected that. He doesn't over heat in it and I don't mind the weight of it, just think about an arm work out without going to the gym! The shoulder pads are much bigger than the last but again, they just give your baby a little more cushion so the straps aren't digging into its shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G

customer_reviews.title: Britax is absolutely the best there is
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had at least 3 different brands of car seats over the years. Britax is absolutely the best there is. Installation is EASY & this thing does not budge. The seat itself is deep which I love. The colors are attractive and we bang this thing all over and haven’t gotten a scratch or anything in the last 3 months. We use this with the BOB Jogger and love it. I’ve already bought the next convertible car seat for when baby moves on. I could rave about Britax carseats all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mate

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 stars for quality and safety. Fit on the other hand :(
customer_reviews.text: It is clearly a quality car seat.. structurally sound and easy to use but...... It is narrow and deep..seems uncomfortable for my baby and she’s average.. she’s only 4mo and I’m already starting to look for another seat. But this may be part of design for safety.. Just seems short lived.. I do not think any baby can fit in this to 40lbs. I was struggling at 13lbs but with tricks trying to make it last
customer_reviews.author: MelHB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and adjust, but cheap canopy & angle too upright not ideal for long stroller rides
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and adjust to size of child. Cover is easy to remove and clean (I know my little poop monster has had a few explosions in it already) There are only two things I don't like about this car seat: the canopy and angle of seat back. The canopy seems to be made of cheap thin fabric which provide some shade but I doubt it does much for protect UV rays. The angle of the seat back is too upright when it is attached to a Britax B-agile stroller or BOB stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not functionally live up to it's reputation
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said we had to get a Britax car seat but this thing is a crummy product. Pretty clear who ever designed this has very little knowledge of babies and certainly never tried to use it. The shoulder straps and pads are not positioned well, it requires two hands plus a foot or knee to adjust the carrying handle, the cover gets caught up with the carrier handle every time you move it. All things that a little foresight and testing could have prevented.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Foster

customer_reviews.title: MIRROR NOT APPROVED BY AMERICAN SAFETY STANDARDS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carseat! We learned today in our car seat inspection however that the mirror, is apparently not approved or recommended by any car seat expert or by American safety standards. It sticks out too far off the mount for it to be considered safe. Buy the seat without the mirror! Don't spend the extra money on this mirror as it could cause injury to your infant.
customer_reviews.author: Semi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use!
customer_reviews.text: We used this carseat for my son's first year and it was all a breeze. No issues whatsoever. I was a little worried about the weight as I had heard it is heavier than others, but we got used to it just fine. We used adaptors to attach it to the BabyJogger City Mini and were very happy with the combination!
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars but won't fit in Chevy pickup
customer_reviews.text: This car seat seemed amazing but does not fit in a Chevy Silverado 1500 extended cab. The base hung over the seat 5-6 inches. It would not pass inspection. It does fit in a 2018 Chevy Traverse. Install was quick and easy. We bought two and kept one, returned one. I do love the carseat and wish it fit in both our vehicles!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E Hart

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is great! Our previous one was making out son scream ...
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is great! Our previous one was making out son scream awful screams in the car so I finally got some recommendations for good body alignment. Since getting this car seat there are been no more tears in the car and it's a great bonus knowing he's super safe!
customer_reviews.author: KaylaSue

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome carseat. Cute cow print. Nice and comfy for my baby girl. She sleeps well during car rides and never gets all sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: Quick install and happy baby
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat! We had one for our first two children and just got this one for our newest addition. The base is very easy to install using the click system. The seat is deep and a little narrow-but nothing that made it difficult to use or the baby unhappy. I would recommend this seat to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Allissa Bolick

customer_reviews.title: I love this car-seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Britax and how they make there stuff, yes the car seat is heavier but well made and it will keep baby safe! You will know that it is heavy if done your reasearch, also know it’s one of the top rated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Car Seat Saved my Daughter's Life!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car seat I have ever owned for my children! It did EXACTLY what it was supposed to when we were hit by a drunk driver who hit us at 93mph on December16, 2018. She had no physical injuries thanks to this amazing car seat. Thank you Britax for making this car seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Cam & Cody Eberlyn

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome car seat! The base installation is simple and the car seat is easy to lock and unlock from the base. It is a very comfortable car seat, we use it on an occasional basis when the baby is super fussy and we just need to get her to STFU.
customer_reviews.author: amandeep gill

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PROTECTION FOR OUR BABY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE BRITAX!!! But have never had an infant BRITAX seat before, so we are THRILLED this time to have one for our sweet baby coming in just a week!! It is SUCH EXCELLENT QUALITY!!! BRITAX once again does NOT disappoint!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Meier

customer_reviews.title: Great brand! Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I had the same brand car seat for my first son, 5 years ago. I loved it. He looked very secure and comfortable in it. I purchased this one for my 2 nd son. You can not put a price on the safety of your child.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat! It's very easy to use and install in my car, and my baby seems to like it as well. Britax has gotten great safety reviews and is well liked, and I trust that this car seat will keep my baby safe.
customer_reviews.author: KelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very good materials and look but not comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I love britax and its the only brand we have used with all my kids. This particular model though, is veryy deep and narrow which makes it uncomfortable for baby past 6 mo if you have a chunky baby. I would not buy again due to how NARROW and DEEP it is.
customer_reviews.author: Wt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but was taken out of the package and it is easy to put into base and remove. Buckles seems easy to adjust and material is good. Exactly what was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat based on good reviews and safety ratings. However, my baby is barely 2 months old and 15 pounds and he is now too wide for the seat. He cries when I put him in it and now I am forced to buy a convertible seat way earlier than I should be. This makes life harder as a new mom because I can’t use my expensive car seat that fits in my stroller and makes errands easier. If you think you might be having a big baby, don’t buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and known safety.
customer_reviews.text: This brand you can't go wrong with! Always high quality always safe. My daughter has one, so I just bought this for our new grand baby and couldn't be happier! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Im in love with this seat!!
customer_reviews.text: The print is amazing! Easy to use, one if the best brands, whats not the like? Strap pads are lame
customer_reviews.author: Shaunnakins

customer_reviews.title: safest infant you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson, he's 5 months now and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Survived an accident
customer_reviews.text: We had an accident and there was not a scratch. No better testament!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: I really like this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat. The adjustable head is nice. It feels very sturdy. The base is easy to install and remove. My only complaint is it’s very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jcfow

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice car seat. Fabric feels nice. Handle can be turned all the way down to secure the car seat when on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Safety , very well padded
customer_reviews.text: Love the padding and safety of car seat. Really like the red although it was not the red it showed in picture it was more of a burgundy reddish, but still nice .
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is easy to install and use. It seems nicely padded and comfortable. Much nicer and easier to use than our previous graco infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Griffith

customer_reviews.title: VERY NARROW
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car seat thinking it has high security rating but it become too small for our baby . Our 5 month old is not able to fit properly even the seat specification says it can fit 35 pound baby but in real it is not possible. It's getting too narrow and soon we need to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: ritika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love britax carseats. They are a bit heavy but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dezeray

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy these car seats are to adjust daily cause it feels like baby is growing daily lol! Sturdy and super safe!
customer_reviews.author: idomakeupnhair

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: My baby just use one month, it is too small to him
customer_reviews.author: johnthan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: To narrow for 2 of my kids and to heavy like ridiculously but 2 of my babies hated this seat... don't buy
customer_reviews.author: chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and the "safety", durability. But the most heavy car seat that has ever been made. I hate it because its bulky and my arms are dead from car to house or car to store!
customer_reviews.author: Jasminm

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very deep and hard to get the baby in and out
customer_reviews.author: Marin Damerow

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat kept my 6 week old infant safe in a horrific car accident! We will be buying another one to replace the one from the wreck.
customer_reviews.author: Saha11

customer_reviews.title: ... our Grandaughter who is going to have our first Great Grandchild tis summer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Grandaughter who is going to have our first Great Grandchild tis summer. She looked at all the specs etc. and decided this was the one. We'll see !
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Julicher

customer_reviews.title: Not for infant under 10 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this seat for our newborn based on reviews and being a top pick on a mommy website. Well, this seat is way too roomy and upright for our 7 lb. newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Britax B Safe 35 for my last child and really like the feature in the Elite of not having to re-thread straps as the baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Crane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: High quality easy to install car seat. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. Very heavy compared with other brands
customer_reviews.text: Safe, sturdy. Very heavy compared with other brands. Seat is quite deep. Buckle is tough to undo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish it was a little bigger. I don’t think my son will be able to squeeze in it for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this was the safest car seat for my little preemie. It’s easy to click in and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Newlon

customer_reviews.title: Not correctly listed
customer_reviews.text: Not all the materials listed came with the car seat. Bought on sale as an open box, but the car seat was scratched, used and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good quality car seat. A little on the heavy side but you can feel the quality so it is worth it to me
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat!!! My son is going to love it also
customer_reviews.author: MariaKp

customer_reviews.title: Straps are easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Baby fits snugly and deep into car seat. Straps are easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and feels very secure.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my first grandbaby. Very easy to use, install, and move around.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It was wet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a baby shower gift and it was left out in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Amer

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install the base in our car
customer_reviews.text: Really solid car seat. It was very easy to install the base in our car.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin

customer_reviews.title: Love this ALL BLACK car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Love! I was trying to find an all black car seat without having to spend $400+ on the cybex one. I finally stumbled on this one and bought it. Half the price of the cybex one and I’m completely satisfied. It’s everything I wanted it to be. It’s very easy to clean too. Only con is that, my newborns head falls sideways and I am unable to put a headrest support in it because of the existing one already in it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: At first I loved it, HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it, HOWEVER, ours is only 2 years old and the handle bar got locked into the upward position so it's impossible to get our baby in and out of the thing. When I called to see if there was anything they could do, they offered me a discount on only the exact same seat...well my baby is almost out of it now! I am not impressed with their customer service nor the long term quality of the seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: After researching and reading great professional reviews
customer_reviews.text: After researching and reading great professional reviews, we purchased this seat. It is great and very sturdy. A little heavier than some competitors.
customer_reviews.author: kja

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Extremely easy to connect and disconnect from base. Will update as we use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look for something safer.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the “shock absorbent” feature. If it completely clicked in the base without lifting it would’ve been great, but no.
customer_reviews.author: Brisna

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Padding was too thick on the headrest. It was causing neck and back problems in my newborn. Would not recommend this to anyone.....extremely heavy carseat
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this since my baby isn't here yet but it was easy to install and u can't wait to use it. If it's anything like the Boulevard g4.1 I know I'll love it. My next britax car seat will be for my son. Love this brand and I won't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved britax!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved britax!!!! My little one isn't born yet but I had this same exact car seat for my last child and it is supper safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amber F.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Britax car seat purchase and I have yet to regret buying their products. This time we decided to also purchase the b-agile stroller to combine with the infant seat. LOVE IT! The car seat snaps right into the stroller seamlessly and rides so incredibly smoothly. This infant carrier is just a little bit heavier than other carriers but the safety benefits are worth it in my opinion. Installation of the base is easy and straight forward and the carrier snaps in and out with no trouble. Let’s not forgot about this adorable cow print. I highly reccommend Britax!!
customer_reviews.author: Fallon O'Neil

product_meta.title: Britax B-Safe 35 Elite Infant Car Seat, Vibe
product_meta.description: The B Safe 35 Elite Infant Car Seat is engineered with Britax’s top safety technologies. The rear facing seat features 2 layers of side impact protection and the patented SafeCell Impact Protection System includes a steel frame and energy absorbing base. The removable infant head pad cushions your infant while providing additional support. Easy installation using SafeCenter LATCH and built in lock offs makes it simple to secure the infant car seat base. The Elite car seat is FAA approved without the base. Thanks to the Click & Go System, you can securely attach the infant car seat to any Britax or BOB stroller to make a brilliant travel system that is perfect for your on the go lifestyle. The B Safe 35 Elite Infant Car Seat can be used rear facing 4 35 pounds, child height 32” or less. Infant Car Seat dimensions 17.75” W x 25” H x 26.5” D, seat area 13” D x 8.75” W, shoulder width 10”, harness slot heights 5.5” to 11”. Extra large canopy protects your little one from sun and rain
feature_bullets: Check out our all new B Safe Ultra Infant Car Seat (B07BRNSP4T)
Surrounded in safety: 2 layers of side impact protection, quick adjust head protection, steel frame, and impact absorbing base
Easy installation: Use Safe Center LATCH or built in seat belt lock offs to secure the infant car seat
Travel system ready: Compatible with all Britax Single Strollers using the built in adapters and with all BOB Single and Duallie strollers (adapter sold separately)
Fits: Rear facing 4 to 35 pounds, seat area 13 D, 8.75 W inches; Dimensions 17.75 W x 25 H x 26.5 D inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
